definition: to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
to renovate/to refurbish/to refresh (computer window)/to write a new page (in history)/to break (a record)
to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away

sentences.english: Place on a prepared tray, brush the tops lightly with egg.
sentences.chinese: 放在鋪好烤紙的烤盤上，刷上蛋液入預熱烤箱。

sentences.english: The windshield wipers swished back and forth monotonously.
sentences.chinese: 擋風玻璃上的雨刷單調地來回擺動，發出颼颼聲。

sentences.english: “There’s no question that Dr. Kearns’ wiper circuit was interesting, ” Daykin says.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，卡恩斯博士的雨刷電路是非常有意思的。

sentences.english: At brush to bite to match, brush the hair to move after placing in bit to match come forward.
sentences.chinese: 在刷咬合面時，刷毛置於咬合面上前後移動。

sentences.english: This kind of steel pipe inner wall anticorrosive paint brush IPN8710 major general.
sentences.chinese: 此種鋼管一般內壁主要刷IPN8710防腐塗料。

sentences.english: Wipe the wand off before the first coat to prevent clumping.
sentences.chinese: 把睫毛棒刷乾淨，避免結塊。

sentences.english: I'll rub your back with this brush.
sentences.chinese: 我用這把刷子刷你的後背。

sentences.english: All of us know that we need to brush our teeth twice-a-day and floss on a regular basis.
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道應該一天刷兩次牙並有規律地用牙線潔牙。

sentences.english: A pure nickel coating and n-Al2O3/Ni composite coating were prepared.
sentences.chinese: 製備了純鎳刷鍍層和鎳基納米氧化鋁複合刷鍍層。

sentences.english: A pure nickel coating and n-Al2O3/Ni composite coating were prepared.
sentences.chinese: 製備了純鎳刷鍍層和鎳基納米氧化鋁複合刷鍍層。

sentences.english: When can you finish with the new carpet and paint?
sentences.chinese: 換完新地毯，刷上新牆漆要什麼時候？

sentences.english: Randomly paint the layer with a 200px soft brush with 60% opacity.
sentences.chinese: 用透明度60%，粗細200px的軟筆刷隨便塗鴉。

sentences.english: of us know that we need to brush our teeth twice-a-day and floss on a regular basis.
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道應該一天刷兩次牙並有規律地用牙線潔牙。

sentences.english: Cardboard cartons, with stenciled shipping marks.
When they were brushed twice, his teeth became white and clean.
sentences.chinese: 刷了兩遍之後，他的牙齒變的又白又幹淨。

definition: to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
one time (all the way through)/once through
to rub against/to walk slowly/(coll.) to freeload
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
trumpet/small size (clothes etc)/(coll.) number one/to urinate/(humble) our store
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
